name: FlippyCamera
tagline: A light weight, easy to use camera application for Android that talks to Raspberry Pi
body:
### Welcome to FlippyCamera
This project is about combining Raspberry Pi and Android. The aim is to take the hardware components of Raspberry Pi and let them "talk" to a a sleek Android camera application.

![FlippyCamera in Action](http://sebbas.org/images/flickcam_on_device.png)

### Authors and Contributors
FlippyCamera is maintained by **sebbas** and hosted on Github.

### Support or Contact
Want to know more about this project? Then send me an email or just keep visiting this site or Google Play (yes, the Android app will be there rather sooner than later ;)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
